column5: I came across a site called fishound, and for a membership fee of $40/year they give u $125 credit to try out gear and write reports on them... There is s/h fees for every item picked to try out. They are yours to keep, but im still skeptical on the prices and gimmicks. Anybody have any experience with this site?
Anything too good to be true isn't. I would never send anyone $ on the internet before I had something in my hand, never, unless I knew exactly who I was dealing with i.e. Microsoft, EBay.
